00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003 Name:         MDQ_PulseShapes
00004 Created by:   Nam Tran
00005 
00006 Contents:     hDQ_PulseShapes_[DetName]_[BankName]
00007               - plots the persistency pulse plot
00008 
00009               hDQ_PulseShapes_ProjectionY_[DetName]_[BankName]
00010               - plots the projection of the PusleShapes plot onto
00011                 the y-axis

00084 INT MDQ_PulseShapes_init()
00085 {
00086   // See if the DataQuality_LowLevel/ directory already exists
00087   std::string dir_name("DataQuality_LowLevel/");
00088   if (!gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str())) {
00089     gDirectory->mkdir(dir_name.c_str());
00090   }
00091   gDirectory->Cd(dir_name.c_str());
00092 
00093   // Create a histogram for each detector
00094   std::map<std::string, std::string> Bank2DetMap = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00095   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = Bank2DetMap.begin(); 
00096       mapIter != Bank2DetMap.end(); mapIter++) { 
00097 
00098     std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00099     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00100 
00101     int n_bits = gSetup->GetNBits(bankname);
00102     int max_adc_value = std::pow(2, n_bits);
00103 
00104     // hDQ_PulseShapes_[DetName]_[BankName]
00105     std::string histname = "hDQ_PulseShapes_" + detname + "_" + bankname;
00106     std::string histtitle = "Pulse shape of " + detname;
00107     TH2F* hDQ_Histogram = new TH2F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 
00108                                 400, -0.5, 399.5,
00109                                 max_adc_value, 0, max_adc_value);
00110     hDQ_Histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Stamp [ns]");
00111     hDQ_Histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Pulse height [adc]");
00112     DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map[bankname] = hDQ_Histogram;
00113 
00114     // hDQ_PulseShapesProjectionY_[DetName]_[BankName]
00115     histname = "hDQ_PulseShapes_ProjectionY_" + detname + "_" + bankname;
00116     histtitle = "Pulse shape Y-projection of " + detname;
00117     TH1D* hDQ_Histogram_TH1D = new TH1D(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 
00118                                 max_adc_value, 0, max_adc_value);
00119     hDQ_Histogram_TH1D->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("ADC");
00120     hDQ_Histogram_TH1D->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Arbitary unit");
00121     DQ_PulseShapesProjectionY_histograms_map[bankname] = hDQ_Histogram_TH1D;
00122   }
00123 
00124   // hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals
00125   std::string histname = "hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals";
00126   std::string histtitle = "Pedestals";
00127   hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(),1,0,1);
00128   hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00129   hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Pedestal [ADC]");
00130   hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00131 
00132   // hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises
00133   histname = "hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises";
00134   histtitle = "Noises";
00135   hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(),1,0,1);
00136   hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Bank (Detector)");
00137   hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Noise (FWHM) [ADC]");
00138   hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00139 
00140   // Back to root directory
00141   gDirectory->Cd("/MidasHists/");
00142   return SUCCESS;
00143 }
00144 
00147 INT MDQ_PulseShapes(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00148 {
00149         // Get the event number
00150         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00151 
00152         // Some typedefs
00153         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00154         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00155         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00156 
00157         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00158         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00159         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00160                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00161 
00162         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00163         for (map_iterator mapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); 
00164                         mapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); ++mapIter) 
00165         {
00166           std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00167           std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00168           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = mapIter->second;
00169                         
00170           // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00171                 for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator pulseIter = thePulses.begin();
00172                                 pulseIter != thePulses.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00173 
00174             // Make sure the histograms exist and then fill them
00175                         if (DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map.find(bankname) !=
00176                                         DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map.end()) 
00177                         { 
00178                                 const std::vector<int>& theSamples = (*pulseIter)->GetSamples();
00179                                 for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator sampleIter = theSamples.begin(); 
00180                                                 sampleIter != theSamples.end(); ++sampleIter)
00181                                 {
00182                                         int sample_number = sampleIter - theSamples.begin();
00183                                         //int sample_number = 0;
00184                                         int sample_value = *sampleIter;
00185                                         DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map[bankname]->Fill(sample_number,sample_value);
00186                                 }
00187             }
00188           }
00189         }
00190         return SUCCESS;
00191 }
00192 
00193 INT MDQ_PulseShapes_eor(INT run_number) // Make projection
00194 {
00195         typedef std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator String2StringMapIter;
00196         std::map<std::string, std::string> Bank2DetMap = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00197 
00198         for(String2StringMapIter mapIter = Bank2DetMap.begin(); 
00199                         mapIter != Bank2DetMap.end(); mapIter++) 
00200         { 
00201                 std::string bankname = mapIter->first;
00202                 std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(bankname);
00203 
00204                 if (DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map.find(bankname) !=
00205                                 DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map.end())
00206                 {
00207                         TH2F* hPulseShapes = DQ_PulseShapes_histograms_map[bankname];
00208                         TH1D* hDQ_Histogram_projY = hPulseShapes->ProjectionY();
00209 
00210                         DQ_PulseShapesProjectionY_histograms_map[bankname]->Add(
00211                                         hDQ_Histogram_projY, 1);
00212                         hDQ_Histogram_projY->SetDirectory(0); // not save this in the output
00213 
00214                         // Take pedestal and noise as mean and RMS of the projections
00215                         // but first set the range so that we don't get the massive bins at 0 or the max_adc_value
00216                         hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetXaxis()->SetRange(2, hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetNbinsX()-1);
00217                         int max_bin = hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetMaximumBin();
00218 
00219                         double pedestal = hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetBinCenter(max_bin);
00220                         double pedestal_value = hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetBinContent(max_bin);
00221                         double noise = 0;
00222                         for (int iBin = max_bin; iBin < hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetNbinsX(); ++iBin) {
00223                           double value = hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetBinContent(iBin);
00224                           if (value < 0.5*pedestal_value) {
00225                             noise = hDQ_Histogram_projY->GetBinCenter(iBin) - pedestal;
00226                             break;
00227                           }
00228                         }
00229 
00230                         std::string binlabel = bankname + " (" + detname + ")";
00231                         hDQ_PulseShapes_Pedestals->Fill(binlabel.c_str(), pedestal);
00232                         hDQ_PulseShapes_Noises->Fill(binlabel.c_str(), 2*noise); // at the moment, noise is just from the peak to the half-way down on one side so multiply by 2
00233                 }
00234         }
00235 
00236         return SUCCESS;
00237 }
